pages.text: Mod bees are only available if their requirements are met. A requirement could be if a a certain mod is installed or the existance of a certain resource added by a mod.

pages.title: Aluminum Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#crystalline)Crystalline Bee$(/l) and an $(l:bees/solitary_bees#ashy_mining)Ashy Mining Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Copper Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#crystalline)Crystalline Bee$(/l) and an $(l:bees/solitary_bees#ashy_mining)Ashy Mining Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Tin Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#crystalline)Crystalline Bee$(/l) and an $(l:bees/solitary_bees#ashy_mining)Ashy Mining Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Bronze Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/mod_bees#tin)Tin Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/mod_bees#copper)Copper Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Zinc Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#sweaty)Sweat Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Brass Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/mod_bees#zinc)Zinc Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/mod_bees#copper)Copper Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Lead Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#blue_banded)Blue Banded Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Silver Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#mason)Mason Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Electrum Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/mod_bees#silver)Silver Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Nickel Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#sweaty)Sweat Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Constantan Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/mod_bees#copper)Copper Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/mod_bees#nickel)Nickel Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Invar Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/mod_bees#nickel)Nickel Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Steel Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/hive_bees#coal)Coal Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Platinum Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/hive_bees#gold)Gold Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/wild_bees#ender)Ender Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Titanium Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/bees/hive_bees#diamond)Diamond Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Tungsten Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/hive_bees#coal)Coal Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/wild_bees#ender)Ender Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Radioactive Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/bees/hive_bees#creeper)Creeper Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Silicon Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#nomad)Nomad Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#reed)Reed Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Plastic Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#resin)Resin Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/worker_bees#lumber)Lumber Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Amber Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#crystalline)Crystalline Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#resin)Resin Bee$(/l).

pages.title: Ender Biotite Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#crystalline)Crystalline Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/wild_bees#draconic)Draconic Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Quark

pages.title: Manasteel Bee
pages.text: Obtained by feeding a black lotus to an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Botania

pages.title: Terrasteel Bee
pages.text: Obtained by feeding a Terrasteel ingot to a $(l:bees/mod_bees#manasteel)Manasteel Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Botania

pages.title: Elementium Bee
pages.text: Obtained by feeding an Elementium ingot to a $(l:bees/mod_bees#terrasteel)Terrasteel Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Botania

pages.title: Osmium Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/hive_bees#iron)Iron Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/solitary_bees#neon_cuckoo)Neon Cuckoo Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Mekanism

pages.title: Refined Glowstone Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/mod_bees#osmium)Osmium Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/wild_bees#glowing)Glowing Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Mekanism

pages.title: Refined Obsidian Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/mod_bees#osmium)Osmium Bee$(/l) and an $(l:bees/hive_bees#obsidian)Obsidian Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Mekanism

pages.title: Spacial Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/wild_bees#crystalline)Crystalline Bee$(/l) and an $(l:bees/wild_bees#ender)Ender Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: AE2

pages.title: Allthemodium Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/hive_bees#diamond)Diamond Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/hive_bees#withered)Withered Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Allthemodium

pages.title: Vibranium Bee
pages.text: Bred from a $(l:bees/hive_bees#diamond)Diamond Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/wild_bees#draconic)Draconic Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Allthemodium

pages.title: Unobtainium Bee
pages.text: Bred from an $(l:bees/mod_bees#allthemodium)Allthemodium Bee$(/l) and a $(l:bees/mod_bees#vibranium)Vibranium Bee$(/l).$(br)Required mod: Allthemodium
